name: Happiness_Life
description:
Do you want to get a happiness life?

We need money. But money is not all.

let’s maintain a balance between work and life

HOW TO PLAY

- Work for money.

- Money for furniture.

- You can get double the money after 18:00, but you will lose your health.

- Furniture can provide some effect, also can decorate the home.

- Go to date and get happiness.

- You can get a beautiful wife by dating three times.(Too easy)

- You need to harvest a happiness life.

- Not everything has to be done. Just do something that you think it's important.

- Don't neglect your family.

- Here are four endings.
